description:
My place is close to Subway (8 mins from 2 train at E233rd St). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

55 Minute ride on the 2 train to Times Square, NY. 30 minutes to Grand central via Metro North.

Cozy Studio with private entrance and access to outdoor seating area.
name: Cosy North Bronx studio apartment with Parking
review: cute apartment, close to the train. If you want somewhere affordable to stay in NYC I would recommend this :)
